title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 262.11 - Attorney compensation
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 262.11 - Attorney compensation

State Regulations

No insurer shall compensate an attorney on a capitated fee basis in connection with legal services insurance. Notes

262.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
